糖尿病中的睡眠碎片触发持续肝损害和心血管风险这篇来自Acta Pharmaceutica Sinica B的新文章出版物讨论了与NADPH氧化酶4的SIRT1依赖性表观遗传调制4。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/sleep-fragmentation-in-diabetes-briggers-liggers-lasting-lasting-lasting-liver-damage-and-andage-and-cardiescular-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/sleep-fragmentation-in-diabetes-indiabetes-liggers-lasting-lasting-lasting-damage-andage-and-cardiovascular-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd74fa1f-6b9a-45b6-45b6-840d-fc27dc6e2db1 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 01:08:00 -0400 Sleep fragmentation in diabetes triggers lasting liver damage and cardiovascular risk
使用新型的双特异性杀手Engager的PD-1阳性淋巴细胞的选择性耗竭该新的文章发表在Acta Pharmaceutica Sinica B中讨论了针对PD-1阳性淋巴细胞靶向耗竭的双特异性杀手式参与者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/selective-depletion-of-pd-1-posive-lymphocytes-usis-using-a-novel-novel-bispecific-killer-engager.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/selective-depletion-of-pd-1-posisity-lymphocytes-usis-usis-a- using-a-novel-novel-novel-bispecific-killer-engager-engager.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61AA78BD-AA32-4541-8C13-B054D5555934 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 01:03:57 -0400 Selective depletion of PD-1 positive lymphocytes using a novel bispecific killer engager
通过靶向药物递送来推进肺纤维化治疗宣布新文章的生物集成杂志。肺纤维化（PF）是一种进行性间质性肺疾病，其特征是细胞外基质沉积和组织疤痕过多，导致肺功能受损和呼吸衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/advancing-pulmonary-fibrosis-warteatment-treatment-through-targeted-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/advancing-pulonary-fibrosis-fibrosis-warteatment-treatment-through-targeted-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c32f6559-578c-4f37-b73d-b73d-11ad2b91fec7 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 00:30:00 -0400 Advancing pulmonary fibrosis treatment through targeted drug delivery
新的Cochrane评论突出了新生儿疼痛评估工具中的差距新发布的Cochrane评论显示，用于评估新生婴儿疼痛的临床评级量表上有很大的差距，强调了迫切需要改善工具和全球协作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/new-cochrane-review-highlights-gaps-in-newborn-pain-pain-pain-sassessment-tools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/new-cochrane-review-highlights-gaps-gaps-in-newborn-pain-pain-pain-pain-assessment-tools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B54C9E88-5AFA-418F-811E-42DD3772A647 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 00:26:47 -0400 New Cochrane review highlights gaps in newborn pain assessment tools
AI驱动的肺超声超过诊断结核病的人类专家今天在ESCMID Global 2025提出的一项开创性研究表明，AI驱动的肺超声波在诊断肺结核（TB）方面的表现高9％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/ai-powered-powered-lung-ultrasound-pperforpers-human-experts-human-experts-in-diagegnoming-tuberculculcosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/ai-powered-powered-lung-ultrasound-perperforms-human-experts-human-experts-in-diarmending-tuberculculisosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2451C3BE-09CC-400D-9A33-97BA33373500E Mon, 14 Apr 2025 00:19:48 -0400 AI-powered lung ultrasound outperforms human experts in diagnosing tuberculosis
食品储藏室发现西芝加哥的隐藏糖尿病危机西芝加哥的一项筛查计划发现，有50％的食品不安全个体患有异常的A1c水平，许多人不知道它们是糖尿病或糖尿病前期。这些发现突出了服务不足社区的诊断和控制差距的关键差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/food-pantries-uncover-hidden-diabetes-crisis-crisis-crisis-in-west-chicago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/food-pantries-uncover-hidden-diabetes-crisis-crisis-in-west-chicago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f3A0477-8E96-4ECB-8758-CE106EA34F5F Sun, 13 Apr 2025 23:58:00 -0400 Food pantries uncover hidden diabetes crisis in West Chicago
谁真正决定澳大利亚人吃什么？新研究揭示了金融部门的隐藏权力一项新研究探讨了金融和非金融参与者如何在澳大利亚塑造食品系统投资，揭示了谁拥有促进或预防更健康的食品环境的权力。它引入了“利润加投资”，作为将财务与公共卫生保持一致的潜在工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/who-really-decides-what-what-what-what-what-what--eat-new-new-new-study-revely-financial-financial-financial-financial 28099s-hidden-power.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/who-really-decides-what-what-what-what-what-what----------------------------------------financial-financial-sectore28099s-sectore.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B1684BE2-251F-4154-BBFD-F9CAFAF73671 Sun, 13 Apr 2025 23:01:00 -0400 Who really decides what Australians eat? New study reveals financial sector’s hidden power
肠道微生物可以帮助预防阿尔茨海默氏症吗？全面的综述探讨了肠道菌群多样性和健身如何通过神经炎症，淀粉样蛋白和TAU病理学以及血脑屏障障碍功能障碍来影响阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）风险。它突出了益生菌，饮食干预措施和OMICS技术在恢复微生物平衡和预防神经变性方面的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/can-gut-microbes-help-prevent-alzheimere28099s.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/can-gut-microbes-help-prevent-alzheimere28099s.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A12F6BD4-911E-4B1D-A5A5-89BED5674A68 Sun, 13 Apr 2025 22:16:00 -0400 Can gut microbes help prevent Alzheimer’s?
是什么真正导致酮流感，如何预防酮流感？卑尔根大学的范围审查确定了各种瞬时症状（填充称为“酮流感”），这些症状是在开发生酮饮食期间发生的。该评论探讨了他们的生理基础，并突出了诸如MCT和补充电解质的策略，以减轻过渡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/what what-really-causes-keto-flu-and-how-and-how-can-can-you-prevent-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/what what-really-causes-keto-flu-and-how-and-how-can-can-can-you-prevent-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d506d6f5-0b89-4314-aa2c-34f174e87d4d Sun, 13 Apr 2025 21:43:00 -0400 What really causes keto flu, and how can you prevent it?
孩子们不仅可以通过看父母，学习表演就学会做饭即使这些技能很高，孩子们似乎并不是通过观察父母的食物技能来发展烹饪技巧。取而代之的是，早期积极参与进餐准备可能是建立持久烹饪能力的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/kids-done28099t-learn-to-cook-just-just-by-watching-parents-parents-parents-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250413/kids-done28099t-learn-to-cook-just-just-by-watching-parents-parents-parents-parents-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6717d8d6-0da4-44f5-a851-a851-24ca9cd5eee3 Sun, 13 Apr 2025 20:56:00 -0400 Kids don’t learn to cook just by watching parents, study shows
